body.name: FACETEL Android 13 Tablet 11 Inch Tablet Android Latest with 16GB+256GB+1TB Expand Support, Octa-Core 2.0 GHz, 5G WiFi, Dual Camera,8600mAh, Bluetooth 5.0, HD Screen Tablet with Keyboard Mouse - Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 49 mins
features: Android 13 & Octa Core - Android tablet operating system, allowing users to enjoy a smoother operating experience. Android 13 adopts a new rendering engine that can load web pages and applications faster. In addition, a 2.0GHz eight core processor can significantly improve usage efficiency. Having powerful processing capabilities can help users complete rendering videos, editing photos, and running virtual machines faster, which will greatly improve the user experience.

16GB（8+8）RAM + 256GB ROM + TF 1TB - Tablet 11 Inch have 16 GB of memory (8GB RAM+8GB of extended memory) and 256 GB of ROM memory. The startup and response speed of the application is faster, allowing for smoother enjoyment of games, videos, or task processing. Using an SD card, a tablet can scale up to 1TB, which is enough to store a large amount of photos and videos, let alone worry about running out of memory.

2 IN 1 TABLET - Android 13 tablet has 5G WiFi, which enables fast data transmission and more stable signals. The tablet has Bluetooth 5.0, which provides wider coverage and improved speed for connecting devices. You can access the internet anytime, anywhere, equipped with a Bluetooth keyboard, wireless mouse, and foldable protective cover. It can flexibly convert your tablet into laptop or computer mode for different purposes, making it easy to edit your articles and emails.

Dual Camera & 8600mAh - Tablet has a 5MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera, which can generate stereo vision and use the camera to obtain the depth of field of the image. Tablets have a large battery capacity of 8600 milliampere hours, adopt energy-saving technology, and also have large capacitors. While possessing a large capacitance, it also ensures a more durable battery life for this phone, so there is no need to worry about tablet battery issues when using this tablet.

Perfect After-Sales Service - FACETEL Tablet has a professional support team with 10 years of experience. If there are any issues or missing accessories with the product you purchased, please contact us via Amazon email as soon as possible. After receiving Amazon's email, we will respond promptly, provide technical support and answer questions, and provide a lifetime warranty.Note: Q7 tablets do not support SIM cards

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive speed / Great value
reviews.reviewText: I have had the tablet for about a week. I added a 128 gb sd card in addition to the device's already impressive 128 gb internal memory. This should give me more than enough storage for years to come. I love the fact that this device does not come loaded w/ bloatware. The peripherals, i.e. keyboard and mouse are great. I am actually using the keyboard to type this review and it works flawlessly. I had another Chinese tablet from LNMBBS that I had to return due to issues w/ the software. This Facetel tablet has really impressed me with it's speed. I am not a gamer so I do not know how it would work with processor intense games. I use it for email, news, and video. I use it for about an hour a day. I did notice that the battery seems to work best if you drain it and then charge it. When I got it the battery was almost fully charged and I noticed that the battery seemed to be going down fairly quickly. I let it go down to about 10% and then charged it to full. The battery is now lasting about three days with my amount of usage. It is on it's third day today and it is at 24%. If you are watching movies for several hours a day I suspect you would need to charge daily. I use the tablet to view my security cameras and the video streams very smoothly. All in all I am extremely happy with this device and would definetly recommend to a friend. You can pay a lot more for Apple or Samsung but this tablet meets all my needs and then some.Update: I have now had the tablet for more than a month and am even more impressed. I have been using it to cast video to my t.v. 's and it works great. If you were going to get the same performance from one of the big brands, I suspect you would have to pay more than twice as much. Great tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bundle package
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for Christmas as a gift you get the tablet a case a mouse a keyboard the charging cord I mean everything's included in one package oh and the screensaver all for a great price you can't beat it great by and easy to use and set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not a bt mouse
reviews.reviewText: The product came with a mouse that is not bluetooth. It is a wireless mouse with a usb stick radio. The usb stick is type A with an adapter to go into the type C on the tablet. I've already misplaced it the usb dongle. I will have to order a bluetooth mouse, which is what should have come with this product in the first place. Other than that the tablet is great. It is fast enough for what I want to do. I'm not running any games on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't order again!
reviews.reviewText: The tablet kept freezing up. Couldn't play games on it just for that. Amazon did great with replacing the tablet, very fast! The replacement product still wasn't working well the second time around. I can use it for other things, but it doesn't work well with games. Definitely won't purchase it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very fast uploading, great value for the money. Bluetooth keyboard and mouse work great, connect quick. When using as tablet, very quick and no issues with touch screen. Nice big bright screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If You have any doubts about this tablet, forget them. This thing is very good quality, starting right with the packaging. The tablet feels nice. It's not slippery. It has some good weight, which coincides with the bigger battery. It just feels well built, with a metal shell. The screen is beautiful, and it comes with a screen film, case, keyboard and mouse. Plus, the usual charger and cord. It's an excellent tablet and very good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a nice package!
reviews.reviewText: Love this Android tablet. Nice tablet comes with a decent cover, a good quality Bluetooth keyboard and a wireless mouse. If all you need to do is some basic tasks like writing emails, reading books, take online training, WeChat etc, it will suffice you in a very reasonable price. I am very satisfied with this purchase. The tablet is running pretty fast and touch screen is sensitive. The battery life is good too. I own an iPad too, the experience is quite similar if you learn Android one way or anther. I don't see why you need to spend several hundred dollars more for an iPad, and another hundred dollar of more for accessories. This package has all you need to get your work done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I lose about 20% battery an hour! I play one game and that's it. I've got the brightness turned down, I've gone through and restricted like every single app possible so nothing runs in the background 20% an hour loss this is ridiculous!Since battery issues are a hit and miss problem. I am going to order another one of these tablets as soon as my refund hits my account. I will update again after I receive the second facetel tabletUPDATE: I ordered a second tablet and this one is much much better 10% battery loss an hour with battery saved off which is a lot more doable than 20% loss with battery saver on.
